techmeme.title: OpenAI unveils OpenAI for Countries, an initiative to help build out AI infrastructure and customize OpenAI's products for specific languages and local needs (Shirin Ghaffary/Bloomberg)
Uber reports Q1 revenue up 14% YoY to $11.5B, Gross Bookings up 14% YoY to $42.8B, vs. $43.1B est., trips up 18% YoY to 3B, and $1.8B net income; UBER falls ~5% (Natalie Lung/Bloomberg)
Amsterdam-based neobank Finom raised €92.7M from General Catalyst and says it serves 100K+ SMBs in Germany, France, Spain, the Netherlands, and Italy (Mary Ann Azevedo/TechCrunch)
At a Manhattan event, TikTok executives tried to reassure brands and ad clients, saying "we are absolutely confident" in TikTok "and confident in the future" (Sapna Maheshwari/New York Times)
FCC listings show two new Asus ROG Ally 2 handheld models with an Xbox button, AMD chips, 64GB of RAM, larger grips, and two USB-C, likely set for Computex 2025 (VideoCardz.com)
